SEARCH
Package org.openwms.common.location.impl

Class LocationGroupServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.openwms.common.location.impl.LocationGroupServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocationGroupService
@Validated @TxService class LocationGroupServiceImpl extends Object implements LocationGroupService
A LocationGroupServiceImpl is a Spring managed transactional Service that operates on LocationGroup entities and spans the tx boundary.
Author:
Heiko Scherrer
